document_data.name: Wave Riders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wave Riders''' was one of the military organizations that served as the police force and core of the military forces of the kingdom of [[Akanûl]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Wave Riders were in charge of the naval defense of the city of [[Airspur]] and the rest of the kingdom. They acted as the guard of the harbor of Airspur during peacetime.
document_data.Membership:
The Wave Riders were made up mostly of [[watersoul genasi]].

The Wave Riders were under the leadership of the [[Four Stewards|Steward of Fire]]. ''Circa'' [[1479 DR]], the Steward of Fire was [[Magnol]].
